summary.value: A Silent strike, a fatal blow, an assassin's work is never slow.

system.description:
Assassin

ALSO: Secret Agent, Shinobi

  • How are your targets chosen? Do you pick them yourself, or does somebody else do it?

  • Are you a freelancer, or part of an organization? Do you still work for them?

  • One of your previous marks changed you. How, and what happened?

  • Are you currently on a mission? Do you feel apprehensive about it for some reason?

ASSASSIN FREE BENEFITS

  • Permanently increase your maximum Inventory Points by 2.

PREDATOR SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.XutTT5ibA0IWX2kl]{Assassinate} (SL5)

As an action, spend between 5 and 【SL x 5】 MP to select a target and perform a Free Attack using a Brawling, Dagger, or Thrown weapon against them. Add a +1 bonus to your Accuracy Check for every 5 MP spent this way.

If you beat your target’s Defense by 5 or more, multiply the attack’s damage by x2. If the target was Vulnerable to your attack and you triggered the damage multiplier, increase it to x3 and ignore Vulnerable.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.9u8jqkiI27YicLMQ]{Hide In Plain Sight} (SL3)

As an action during a Conflict scene, you may roll 【DEX + INS】. Until the end of your next turn, you may not be directly targeted by any character whose 【INS】 die is lower than the result of your check.

All hiding and sneaking-related checks (including this one) get a 【SL】 bonus.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.LwLkkw4xZcv8ML2V]{Sneak Attack} (SL3)

During your first Turn of any Conflict, you gain a 【SL】 bonus to your Accuracy and Magic Checks. This also applies if you used HIDE IN PLAIN SIGHT during your previous turn.

Gain a 【SL】 bonus to Initiative checks.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.ijcQIoQkCITQvBYp]{Use Poison} (SL3)

As an action, you may spend 2 IP and choose any number of weapons you are holding:
Increase their damage by 【SL】 and change their type to Poison for the rest of the scene.

All checks related to poison knowledge gain a 【SL】 bonus.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.0hUBOQvrWphxkU7b]{Marked For Death}

Whenever you gain an Opportunity and in addition to it, you may choose a single target you can see and apply a Death Mark.

Any damage you deal to that creature is increased by 2 and bypasses their Resistances.

That mark will last until you create a new one, or that opponent is dropped to 0 HP.

Heroic Skills
